short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block shadow AI inside your organization.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enforce your organization's AI Acceptable Use Policies by reducing the potential of Shadow AI. This Chrome extension helps you maintain security and reduce unintended risks by blocking access to unapproved or unmonitored AI services that can lead to data leaks of intellectual property or sensitive data. Shadow AI Blocker provides an easy and free solution to manage AI access within your organization to ensure everyone uses a secured and controllable AI system. 

*Disclaimer: Doesn't block every AI site or AI tool out there, but we maintain a list of the most popular tools and add new sites when they are requested.
